author: sky.cactus
content: Was there an external audit of the ceremony by an independent third party?  If so, what components did the audit cover?

author: sky.cactus
content: Are there any plans for audits of the ceremony or any of the components in the future?

author: trent_vanepps
content:
general resources: https://github.com/ethereum/kzg-ceremony

Audits specifically: https://github.com/ethereum/kzg-ceremony#audits

one from SECBIT on just the crypto portion of things in Aug '22, Sigma Prime audited the interface and Sequencer in Nov '22

author: sky.cactus
content: Any plans on getting an external party to audit the UI?  Feels critically important given that is the piece of code that is actually in charge of disposing of toxic waste I believe.

author: carlbeek
content: That was covered by the SigP one
